question: Which of the following is not the feature of FEMA?
option1: There is a simplification of Foreign Exchange Transactions.
option2: There was a discharge provisions of criminal proceedings in case of default cases.
answer: There was a discharge provisions of criminal proceedings in case of default cases.
explanation: FEMA was enacted in 1999 and is in effect from 01.06.2000.It made all offence regarding Foreign Exchange Civil Offence, as opposed to criminal offences as dictated by FERA.
